artist: Engraver: Simon Charles Miger; Painter: After Du Roncerai
description: bust length portrait of man turned left and looking out at viewer, wearing a short white curly wig, jacket with lace ruffle at neck of vest; in circular frame with pedestal below
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on pedestal in black: PANNARD | below image in black: Du Roncerai Pinx.  Miger Sculp. | on sheet in pencil: 2-68 | on verso in pencil: 7/601
title: Portrait of Pannard
